name: We Need To Dive Quickly !
description:
Can you dive into the terrors of the deep ? Your mission is to explore the depths with your prototype that allows you to go into unexplored waters... However, your adventure will be the last one, something is chasing you, blocking your way out, since when is it following you ? All you can do now is go deeper and try to survive as long as possible before the creature catches up with you.

Controls :
Left click to dash (Only when you have the driller unlock)
Right click to fire laser (Only when you have the weapon laser unlock)

You will have multiple upgrade to do to push your submarine deeper and survive longer, there's a save system so don't go for a one shot :)
Please, if you enjoy the game, leave me a comment or a critic to help me.
Thanks for playing.
